basics.name: Dominik Zabro≈Ñ
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Result-oriented Software Engineering Professional with over 14 years of experience in developing and optimizing software solutions across diverse industries. Skilled in stakeholder communication, ensuring alignment of software architecture with business objectives to drive successful outcomes. Proven leadership experience in guiding cross-functional teams, with strong mentoring and code-review skills that foster a culture of quality and collaboration. Proficient in Python and experienced in leveraging various database technologies to build robust, scalable applications. Demonstrated ability to design and implement efficient data processing pipelines, enhance system performance, and support data-driven decision-making. Familiar with JavaScript, enabling effective collaboration with front-end development teams. Possesses hands-on cloud experience, utilizing cloud platforms to enhance application scalability and deployment efficiency. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, committed to delivering high-quality solutions that meet business goals.

work.name: Cisco Systems
highlights: Led cross-functional teams in designing, developing, and deploying scalable software solutions, significantly improving client operations and reducing project delivery time
Collaborated closely with stakeholders to define requirements and align software architecture with business goals, resulting in optimized performance and cost efficiency
Conducted in-depth code reviews and provided mentorship to junior engineers from diverse cultures, enhancing code quality, security, and overall team productivity
Developed and implemented automated testing suites and CI/CD pipelines, reducing release cycles and improving deployment reliability
Delivered data-driven insights and strategic guidance to clients on software best practices, helping organizations modernize legacy systems and adopt innovative technologies
Spearheaded the development of a data mesh platform, enhancing data accessibility and governance across departments to foster decentralized data ownership and streamlined analytics
Architected a workflow orchestration system that optimized task automation, reducing manual effort and improving process efficiency across support operations
Built a remote development kit, enabling secure, efficient remote management capabilities that streamlined device connectivity and remote administration
Designed and implemented a log anomaly detection system that leveraged machine learning to proactively identify network irregularities, and enhancing operational resilience

work.name: ReSpo.Vision
highlights: Designed and optimized high-throughput data ingestion pipelines, processing thousands of live records daily from diverse external APIs to support advanced statistical analysis
Established data quality assurance protocols, ensuring accurate, clean data flow through the pipeline and minimizing discrepancies for reliable insights
Collaborated with data scientists and analysts to tailor data structures and workflows, facilitating rapid access to actionable insights and supporting data-driven decision-making

work.name: William Hill
highlights: Architected and developed a dynamic landing page generator, enabling marketing teams to create and deploy campaign-specific pages quickly
Implemented a modular, user-friendly interface and backend system, allowing seamless customization of landing pages while maintaining brand consistency and optimizing for conversion

work.name: William Hill
highlights: Developed secure APIs to integrate with front-end systems, payment gateways, and third-party providers, enabling seamless communication and interoperability across platforms
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve payout calculations, and ensure fair play and regulatory adherence in the backend logic

work.name: Cherry Group
highlights: Engineered a high-performance backend system to handle large volumes of real-time transactions, ensuring low latency and high availability in compliance with gaming regulations
Optimized data storage and retrieval processes, leveraging caching and database indexing to achieve sub-second response times for critical game functions
Built automated monitoring and alerting systems, enabling proactive detection and resolution of backend issues, reducing downtime and improving user experience

work.name: FutureMind
highlights: Designed RESTful APIs tailored for mobile app requirements, enabling efficient data exchange and optimizing app performance across multiple devices and network conditions
Integrated third-party services and APIs to enhance app functionality, such as real-time notifications and analytics, supporting a seamless user experience and geolocation services

work.name: Sesto
highlights: Developed a robust inventory management system for real-time tracking and analysis of inventory levels, accessible via web and mobile devices

work.name: SKOK Piast
highlights: Developed automated reporting dashboards to provide real-time insights into credit, interest rate, and liquidity risks, enabling faster, data-driven decision-making for risk management teams
Built and maintained data pipelines that aggregated and processed risk metrics from various sources, ensuring data accuracy and reliability for comprehensive risk assessments
Conducted in-depth analysis of historical and current financial data, identifying trends and patterns to support strategic risk mitigation and compliance with regulatory standards

work.name: PwC
highlights: Analyzed large datasets of journal entries to identify anomalies and ensure data integrity, supporting accurate financial reporting and compliance with auditing standards

work.name: PKP Energy
highlights: Conducted comprehensive research and analysis on wholesale energy price trends, delivering actionable insights to support pricing strategies and market forecasting

education.institution: Fachhochschule des BFI Wien, University of Economics in Katowice
